class

build::BuildLog

  compiler::CompilerLog
    build::BuildLog

using compiler

**
** BuildLog is used for logging build scripts
**
class BuildLog : CompilerLog
{

  new make(OutStream out := Env.cur.out)
    : super(out)
  {
  }

}
